Sql.query: INSERT INTO gmm_incumplimiento ( incucodi, incuanio, incumes, incuaceptado, incusubsanado, incuusucreacion, incufeccreacion, incuusumodificacion, incufecmodificacion, empgcodi, tipoemprcodi, emprcodi, incumonto ) VALUES ( :incucodi, :incuanio, :incumes, '1', '1', :incuusucreacion, sysdate, null, null, :empgcodi, :tipoemprcodi, :emprcodi, :incumonto )

UPDATE gmm_incumplimiento SET incuanio = :incuanio, incumes = :incumes, incuusumodificacion = :incuusumodificacion, incufecmodificacion = sysdate, empgcodi = :empgcodi, tipoemprcodi = :tipoemprcodi, emprcodi = :emprcodi, incumonto = :incumonto WHERE incucodi = :incucodi

UPDATE gmm_trienio t1 SET (trinuminc) = (SELECT count(distinct(incuanio + incumes)) FROM gmm_incumplimiento t2 WHERE t1.empgcodi = t2.empgcodi group by empgcodi) WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM gmm_incumplimiento t2 WHERE t1.empgcodi = t2.empgcodi and t1.empgcodi = :empgcodi)

SELECT incucodi as IncucodiEdit, incuanio as IncuanioEdit, incumes as IncumesEdit, incumonto as IncumMontoEdit, '(' || trim(emp1.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp1.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp1.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as IncumplidoraEdit, '(' || trim(emp2.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp2.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp2.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as AfectadaEdit, inc.empgcodi as EmpgcodiEdit, inc.emprcodi as EmprcodiEdit, inc.TIPOEMPRCODI FROM gmm_incumplimiento inc join si_empresa emp1 on emp1.emprcodi = (select emprcodi from gmm_empresa where empgcodi = inc.empgcodi) join si_empresa emp2 on emp2.emprcodi = inc.emprcodi WHERE incucodi = :incucodi

SELECT incucodi as IncucodiEdit, incuanio as IncuanioEdit, incumes as IncumesEdit, incumonto as IncumMontoEdit, '(' || trim(emp1.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp1.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp1.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as IncumplidoraEdit, '(' || trim(emp2.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp2.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp2.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as AfectadaEdit, inc.empgcodi as EmpgcodiEdit, inc.emprcodi as EmprcodiEdit, inc.TIPOEMPRCODI FROM gmm_incumplimiento inc join si_empresa emp1 on emp1.emprcodi = inc.empgcodi join si_empresa emp2 on emp2.emprcodi = inc.emprcodi WHERE incucodi = :incucodi

SELECT inc.incucodi as IncucodiEdit, inc.incuanio || '-' || inc.incumes as IncumAnioMes, '(' || trim(emp1.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp1.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp1.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as IncumEmprDeudora, '(' || trim(emp2.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp2.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp2.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as IncumEmprAfectada, inc.incumonto as IncumMonto, inc.empgcodi, inc.emprcodi, ( select LISTAGG(tinf.tinfinforme, ', ')WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY tinf.tinfinforme) FROM gmm_detincumplimiento dinc join gmm_tipinforme tinf on tinf.tinfcodi = dinc.tinfcodi where dinc.incucodi = inc.incucodi and dincestado = '1' ) as IncumInforme FROM gmm_incumplimiento inc join si_empresa emp1 on emp1.emprcodi = (select emprcodi from gmm_empresa where empgcodi = inc.empgcodi) join si_empresa emp2 on emp2.emprcodi = inc.emprcodi WHERE 1 = 1 and inc.incuanio = case {0} when 0 then inc.incuanio else {0} end and inc.incumes = case '{1}' when '-' then inc.incumes else '{1}' end and UPPER(emp1.emprnomb) like case '{2}' when '-' then UPPER(emp1.emprnomb) else UPPER('%{2}%') end and emp1.emprruc like case '{3}' when '-' then emp1.emprruc else '%{3}%' end and inc.TIPOEMPRCODI = 20 UNION SELECT inc.incucodi as IncucodiEdit, inc.incuanio || '-' || inc.incumes as IncumAnioMes, '(' || trim(emp1.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp1.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp1.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as IncumEmprDeudora, '(' || trim(emp2.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp2.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp2.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as IncumEmprAfectada, inc.incumonto as IncumMonto, inc.empgcodi, inc.emprcodi, ( select LISTAGG(tinf.tinfinforme, ', ')WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY tinf.tinfinforme) FROM gmm_detincumplimiento dinc join gmm_tipinforme tinf on tinf.tinfcodi = dinc.tinfcodi where dinc.incucodi = inc.incucodi and dincestado = '1' ) as IncumInforme FROM gmm_incumplimiento inc join si_empresa emp1 on emp1.emprcodi = (select emprcodi from si_empresa where emprcodi = inc.empgcodi) join si_empresa emp2 on emp2.emprcodi = inc.emprcodi WHERE 1 = 1 and inc.incuanio = case {0} when 0 then inc.incuanio else {0} end and inc.incumes = case '{1}' when '-' then inc.incumes else '{1}' end and UPPER(emp1.emprnomb) like case '{2}' when '-' then UPPER(emp1.emprnomb) else UPPER('%{2}%') end and emp1.emprruc like case '{3}' when '-' then emp1.emprruc else '%{3}%' end and inc.TIPOEMPRCODI = 3

SELECT inc.incucodi as IncucodiEdit, inc.incuanio || '-' || inc.incumes as IncumAnioMes, '(' || trim(emp1.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp1.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp1.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as IncumEmprDeudora, '(' || trim(emp2.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp2.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp2.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as IncumEmprAfectada, inc.incumonto as IncumMonto, inc.empgcodi, inc.emprcodi, ( select LISTAGG(tinf.tinfinforme, ', ')WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY tinf.tinfinforme) FROM gmm_detincumplimiento dinc join gmm_tipinforme tinf on tinf.tinfcodi = dinc.tinfcodi where dinc.incucodi = inc.incucodi and dincestado = '1' ) as IncumInforme FROM gmm_incumplimiento inc join si_empresa emp1 on emp1.emprcodi = (select emprcodi from gmm_empresa where empgcodi = inc.empgcodi) join si_empresa emp2 on emp2.emprcodi = inc.emprcodi WHERE 1 = 1 and inc.incuanio = case {0} when 0 then inc.incuanio else {0} end and inc.incumes = case '{1}' when '-' then inc.incumes else '{1}' end and UPPER(emp2.emprnomb) like case '{2}' when '-' then UPPER(emp2.emprnomb) else UPPER('%{2}%') end and emp2.emprruc like case '{3}' when '-' then emp2.emprruc else '%{3}%' end and inc.TIPOEMPRCODI = 20 UNION SELECT inc.incucodi as IncucodiEdit, inc.incuanio || '-' || inc.incumes as IncumAnioMes, '(' || trim(emp1.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp1.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp1.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as IncumEmprDeudora, '(' || trim(emp2.emprruc) || ') ' || NVL(TRIM(NVL(emp2.EMPRRAZSOCIAL,emp2.EMPRNOMB)), ' - SIN RAZON SOCIAL - ') as IncumEmprAfectada, inc.incumonto as IncumMonto, inc.empgcodi, inc.emprcodi, ( select LISTAGG(tinf.tinfinforme, ', ')WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY tinf.tinfinforme) FROM gmm_detincumplimiento dinc join gmm_tipinforme tinf on tinf.tinfcodi = dinc.tinfcodi where dinc.incucodi = inc.incucodi and dincestado = '1' ) as IncumInforme FROM gmm_incumplimiento inc join si_empresa emp1 on emp1.emprcodi = (select emprcodi from si_empresa where emprcodi = inc.empgcodi) join si_empresa emp2 on emp2.emprcodi = inc.emprcodi WHERE 1 = 1 and inc.incuanio = case {0} when 0 then inc.incuanio else {0} end and inc.incumes = case '{1}' when '-' then inc.incumes else '{1}' end and UPPER(emp2.emprnomb) like case '{2}' when '-' then UPPER(emp2.emprnomb) else UPPER('%{2}%') end and emp2.emprruc like case '{3}' when '-' then emp2.emprruc else '%{3}%' end and inc.TIPOEMPRCODI = 3
